# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  README bug_561.cir bug_561.cir.sh tags DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_561.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_561/bug_561.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} bug_561.cir.sh "mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce>" ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug_561.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_561/bug_561.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_561/bug_561.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "parallel;nightly")
endif()
